Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
92 Sanidassanattika, Niyyānikaduka
Sanidassanattika, Niyyānikaduka
143.
340Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
341Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
<< 91 Sanidassanattika, Pariyāpannadukaup93 Sanidassanattika, Niyataduka >>
